description:
GitLab’s 8th annual Global DevSecOps Report has unveiled a complex landscape of software development, highlighting disparities between executive perceptions and developer realities. The survey, conducted in April 2024, gathered insights from over 5,300 professionals across the software development spectrum. While 69% of CxOs report shipping software at least twice as fast as last year, AI... Read more »

The post GitLab’s DevSecOps report highlights AI challenges appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: GitLab’s DevSecOps report highlights AI challenges
